document.full_text: berkshire hathaway inc   will report a significantly lower first-quarter profit, as one of the worst quarters ever for global catastrophes weighed on the company's insurance businesses, chief executive warren buffett said on saturday.
document.title: insurance to drag on berkshire q1 results
lines_and_colors: berkshire hathaway inc   will report a significantly lower first-quarter profit, as one of the worst quarters ever for global catastrophes weighed on the company's insurance businesses, chief executive warren buffett said on saturday.
